values: The Final Divide: Eternal Life or Eternal Wrath, Part 2The Final Divide: Eternal Life or Eternal Wrath, Part 2

God shows no partiality. Whether Jew or Gentile, all who love and do evil will face wrath, and all who trust Christ and obey God will have glory.God shows no partiality. Whether Jew or Gentile, all who love and do evil will face wrath, and all who trust Christ and obey God will have glory.
